question: Who has won the silver medal at the Under-23 Wrestling World Championships 2019 held recently?
explanation: Ravi Rathi had emerged victorious in the bout when he defeated Uzur Dzhuzupbekov of Kyrgyzstan 3-1 and won beonze medal at the Under-23 Wrestling World Championship 2019. With this, Indiaâ€™s campaign at the tournament came to an end with Ravinder (61kg) and Pooja Gehlot (53kg) returning with silver medals.
